original_text: For if a wife will not cover her head, then she should cut her hair short. But since it is disgraceful for a wife to cut off her hair or shave her head, let her cover her head.
korean_text: 만일 여자가 머리를 가리지 않거든 깎을 것이요 만일 깎거나 미는 것이 여자에게 부끄러움이 되거든 가릴지니라

sentences.original_text: For if a wife will not cover her head,
then she should cut her hair short.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그녀는 머리를 짧게 잘라야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: But since it is disgraceful for a wife
to cut off her hair or shave her head,
